Tweetstream is now Web Scale

22 December 2010

Over the past few months, I have been working with Downstream on one of their products Tweetstream. In addition to building features, we have experienced a significant issue with the infrastructure.

Last night we pushed live a slew of updates and as a result the application is much speedier. The guys were so thrilled with the result that they wanted me to write a geeky technical post about all the changes for their users. You can read the entire article on their blog and also discuss it on Hacker News
